title: The Great Gatsby
description: A classic novel of the Jazz Age, capturing the decadence and excess of the 1920s.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel of warmth and humor tackling serious issues of race and injustice in the Deep South.
A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A romantic novel that also critiques the societal expectations of 19th-century England.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A novel following the teenage angst and alienation of Holden Caulfield.
